It would follow the escape to Zihuatanejo that happened at the end of the first film
The theme of redemption through hope would likely continue in a hypothetical sequel
Prison reform and freedom would be central themes to the story
Andy's new adventures and life in Brazil would be the main narrative focus
Morgan Freeman's character might return for narration in this imaginary film
The tropical beach paradise that Andy dreams about would become his new reality
The movie exists only in the imagination of fans who desperately wanted more
